data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
Thank you for downloading Doom Mod Loader 2.X!
DML 2.X is an open-source software licensed under the BSD 3.0 License. You can read the license at the end of this text, at https://github.com/Premo36/DML2.X/blob/master/LICENSE.txt, and in the "README v2.6.txt" file. You can find the software's source code and beta releases on GitHub at https://github.com/Premo36/DML2.X.
This software will automatically check for updates every time you open it and will notify you if a new version is available for download. Note that it will only check for new STABLE releases; for BETA releases, you will have to check the releases on my GitHub or keep an eye on my Twitter (@p36software). You can disable this feature by un-ticking the "Check for updates" option.
I designed this software to be user-friendly and straightforward, but if you need help, the "README v2.6.txt" file included with the software should answer most of your questions. If you can't find the answer you're looking for in the README, want to report a bug, give me suggestions for new features, or just want to let me know what you think about DML 2.X, feel free to email me at info@p36software.net.
In order to use this software, you must accept both the BSD 3.0 license terms and, since it connects to my website to check for new versions, my website’s privacy policy, which you can read at https://p36software.net/privacy-policy.
For credits, see "README v2.6.txt" or https://github.com/Premo36/DML2.X/blob/master/CREDITS.md.
If you're interested in my software, games, open-source projects, or just want to contact me, you can find me here: -Website: https://p36software.net -Email: info@p36software.net -Twitter: https://twitter.com/p36software (@p36software, updated more often) -GitHub: https://github.com/Premo36 -ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/members/premo36 -IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/members/premo36 -YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9yqO2r6CJeLcKebDr142eA
DML Current Version: 2.6 (31/07/2025) (You can read all changelogs here: https://p36software.net/downloads/dml2/changelog.txt. The number in parentheses is the issue number on the DML2.X GitHub) New Features: -Start a preset directly by passing the preset name as a command-line argument to the DML executable. This way, you can have multiple shortcuts on your desktop, each one starting a preset directly (#29 - Thanks to @StephenChamberlain). -New version notification is now available under Mono (#37).
Bug Fixes: -Fixed potential security issues in new version notification system.
Other: -Removed support email; it made no sense having two different emails. Just use info@p36software.net for everything (#39). -Removed Tank Rider links (#38 - More info in the GitHub issue). -General improving of any "help text"
Sourceport Compatibility: FULL COMPATIBILITY: -GZDoom (v4.14.2) -LZDoom (v3.87c) -Zandronum (3.2) -ZDoom (2.8.1) -QZDoom (2.1.0) -Skulltag (98d)
PARTIAL COMPATIBILITY (Some DML features may not work): -Chocolate Doom (3.0.1) -PrBoom+ (2.6.2)
(As long as it follows the ZDoom command-line standard, any engine should work fine.) ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- BSD 3-Clause License
Copyright (c) 2016 - 2025, Matteo Premoli (P36 Software) All rights reserved.
Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
1. Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
2. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
3. Neither the name of the copyright holder nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software without specific prior written permission.
THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
